question: How to reset password?
answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password?'. Follow the instructions sent to your registered email address.

question: How to change email address?
answer: To change your email address, go to your account settings and update your email in the profile section. question: How to delete my account?
answer: To delete your account, please contact our support team via the contact form on our website. They will guide you through the process.

question: How to contact support?
answer: You can contact support by filling out the contact form on our website or by emailing

question: How to update my profile information?
answer: To update your profile information, log in to your account and navigate to the profile settings. Here you can edit your personal details.

question: How to view my order history?
answer: To view your order history, log in to your account and go to the 'Orders' section. Here you can see all your past orders.
